Name: Battle Imagine - The Bear
Description:
Use to activate or upgrade The Bear's Battle Imagine skill: Arcane! Blazing Axe.

Arcane! Blazing Axe
Transform into Boss: The Bear and summons a blazing giant axe, increasing the team's Attack Power for a period and granting yourself additional Attack Power boost.
(This effect cannot stack and only one will be effective.)
Description2: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
